ve.description: Selects till the end of a word

vip.description: Selects a paragraph (text object) and so on

V.description: Visually select the current line, you can extend this using motion commands

Vgg.description: Selects the current line and then extends to the start of the file

o.description: Move the cursor to the diagonally opposite corner of the visual selection

O.description: Move the cursor to the other corner of the current line in visual block selection
